    Method
    Description
    static Quantity<Force>
    Electromagnetism.coulombForce(Quantity<ElectricCharge> q1, Quantity<ElectricCharge> q2, Quantity<Length> r)
    Coulomb's law: F = k * |q1*q2| / r² where k = 1/(4πε₀)
    static Quantity<Force>
    Electromagnetism.lorentzForce(Quantity<ElectricCharge> charge, Quantity<Velocity> velocity, Quantity<MagneticFluxDensity> B)
    Magnetic force on moving charge: F = qvB (simplified, perpendicular case)
